attributes.action: ABOLISH THE DUTY ON FUEL AT THE PUMPS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By abolishing the duty on fuel Britain will be able to get back to work and be more competitive in the marketplace.
Cheaper fuel = cheaper goods which will lead to increased spending and stave off any lingering fears of recession. This should come into force as soon as possible with a 20% rise in road tax and 10% rise in insurance to offset it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
